description:
Yangyang is an Outrider of the Midnight Rangers.
Once sheltered, now a fighter. She soars with the wind to protect others, like a skylark in flight.

skills.name: Feather as Blade
skills.description: Basic Attack Yangayang performs up to 4 consecutive attacks, dealing Aero DMG. Heavy Attack Yangyang consumes STA to lunge forward, dealing Aero DMG. Heavy Attack: Zephyr Song Use Basic Attack after Heavy Attack or Dodge Counter to perform Heavy Attack Zephyr Song, dealing Aero DMG. Mid-air Attack Yangyang consumes STA to perform a Plunging Attack from mid-air, dealing Aero DMG. Dodge Counter Use Basic Attack after a successful Dodge to thrust forward, dealing Aero DMG.

skills.name: Zephyr Domain
skills.description: Yangyang wields her sword to create a whirling vortex of winds that gathers nearby enemies to the center, dealing Aero DMG.

skills.name: Wind Spirals
skills.description: Yangyang conjures a mighty Cyclone that gathers nearby enemies, dealing Aero DMG.

skills.name: Compassion
skills.description: Yangyang recovers 30 STA after she casts a Mid-air Attack Feather Release.

skills.name: Lazuline Mercy
skills.description: Yangyang's Aero DMG Bonus is increased by 8% for 8s after casting Intro Skill Cerulean Song.

skills.name: Cerulean Song
skills.description: Yangyang sends the target into the air, dealing Aero DMG.

skills.name: Echoing Feathers
skills.description: Heavy Attack: Stormy Strike When Yangyang has 3 Melodies, she can cast Stormy Strike after Heavy Attack or Dodge Counter, dealing Aero DMG. Mid-air Attack: Feather Release When Yangyang has 3 Melodies, cast Basic Attack in mid-air to consume all Melodies and perform consecutive strikes, diving from mid-air, dealing Aero DMG. As Yangyang lands, she sheathes her sword with an attack, dealing Aero DMG, considered as Basic Attack DMG. Melody Yangyang can hold up to 3 Melodies Yangyang obtains 1 Melody with every Basic Attack 4 on hit. Yangyang obtains 1 Melody for every Heavy Attack Zephyr Song on hit. Yangyang obtains 1 Melody for every Resonance Skill Zephyr Domain on hit. Yangyang obtains 1 Melody upon casting Intro Skill Cerulean Song.

skills.name: Skillful Cooking
skills.description: Has a chance to produce special dishes when cooking

resonanceChain.name:
Sapphire Skies, 
Soaring Sparrows
resonanceChain.description: Intro Skill Cerulean Song increases Yangyang's Aero DMG Bonus by an additional {0} for {1}s.

resonanceChain.name:
Nesting Twigs, 
in Beaks They Harrow
resonanceChain.description: Heavy Attack recovers an additional {0} Resonance Energy for Yangyang when it hits a target, which can be triggered 1 time every {1}s.

resonanceChain.name: Nature Sings in Symphony
resonanceChain.description: Resonance Skill DMG Bonus is increased by {0}. The Wind Field's pulling effect on surrounding targets is enhanced, and the pulling range is expanded by {1}.

resonanceChain.name: Close Your Eyes and Listen in
resonanceChain.description: Mid-Air Attack Feather Release's damage is increased by {0}.

resonanceChain.name: Winds Whisper in Harmony
resonanceChain.description: Resonance Liberation Wind Spirals's damage is increased by {0}.

resonanceChain.name: A Tribute to Life's Sweet Hymn
resonanceChain.description: After casting Mid-Air Attack Feather Release, the ATK of all team members is increased by {0} for {1}s.

quote: I hope I can be the one to embrace all that you are, and share with you all that you carry.
